website_summaries.verdict: Galleria Enterprise's playful umbrella is suitable for kids and adults.
pros: The pretty goldfish design is fully visible from the inside, so when it's in use it's like being in a fishbowl
Plus the fiberglass ribs hold up well to strong winds
cons: Ribs may be a little too sturdy – this umbrella can be hard to close

customer_reviews.title: We're Already In A Fishbowl: Let the Disabled swim!
customer_reviews.text: I used it during the NYC DISABILITY PRIDE PARADE to get my message across. Everyone LOVED the umbrella! I only wish it had some sort of SPF sunblock rating. It is way better for the rain, than for shade in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Received item in good condition. When I first received the product. It was covered with some white residue powder and had a strong unpleasant plastic/gasoline smell. I wiped off the powder with wet washcloth and tried to remove all of the residue. I then left the umbrella outdoors to air out and expose it to a little sunlight. The smell is all gone. Brought it to work and had a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: liahonamonet

customer_reviews.title: Cute but....
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute umbrella and I love using it, however it arrived slightly damaged (handle stem slightly bent). I contacted the manufacturer but never heard anything back. It makes me a little concerned that it may not be very sturdy and hold up well for long and or multiple use.
customer_reviews.author: k2

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this more than I expected. Good quality. I had initially hesitated to buy this only because I didn't like the fact that, based on the photos, I assumed I wouldn't see the fish from inside the umbrella. It looked like just plain white shapes. However, when there's light shining through, you can totally see all the color details from the inside. Like walking in a fishbowl!
customer_reviews.author: at home in nature

customer_reviews.title: I am thinking they need to figure out a better quality control plan here
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and it was bent. I am thinking they need to figure out a better quality control plan here. 3 stars cause its super cute but i am disappointed cause i waited quite a bit of time for it
customer_reviews.author: Malissa

customer_reviews.title: ... as I expected but I realize that I don't like that it doesn't collapse because it makes it clumsy ...
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is exactly as I expected but I realize that I don't like that it doesn't collapse because it makes it clumsy to keep in my car. Other than that I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Achand

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not great and diameter and depth insufficient
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not great and diameter and depth insufficient. My head touches the spokes and I'm a short person. I thought it would be better given the price. I like it but I would have paid more if it were deeper, a little wider and the plastic wasn't as stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Dezi

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible.  Bent shaft.
customer_reviews.text: Bent shaft. Plastic smell overpowering. A white powder on the entire inside. Hope it won't kill me. Printing was really nice but not worth a bent umbrella and nasty white powder.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Now

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Broke on first use!!/Not new, arrived slightly damaged/used
customer_reviews.text: Update! DONT BUY!!! The rain season finally arrived and I was so excited to finally use this umbrella. Well I opened it outside in the rain and it complete busted!! DONT BUY!! Never even got a chance to use it once :( Item arrived a day late and looks like it's used. The paint on the handle is chipped and plastic is scratch. There is a white powder film that is all over the inside. It works and serves it's purpose so I won't return it but for $30 I was expecting this new. Just be warned you may get a used one as well...
customer_reviews.author: M Fong

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids AND adults.
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted to know what it was like to "swim with the fishes", but you didnt want to be thrown over a boat with cement tied to your feet? Say no more, fam. This umbrella is super quirky and durable. I named all of the fish already. Jedediah is my fave.
customer_reviews.author: Amoré Monét

customer_reviews.title: It'll probably keep you dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Glad I checked it out because it needed to air out. The off gassing was pretty rough, and it had a white residue. After a spray with the hose and leaving it on the porch for a week it should be ready. The pattern is great and the colors are really vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Korben Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming Toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this is pretty much unbearable. I haven’t been able to use it because of how toxic it smells. I’ve had it airing out for a week in my garage and I washed it with wipes and soap to remove all of the white powdery coating it is covered in. It’s a shame, this is really cute and I wish I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shamsie

customer_reviews.title: broke after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: I opened the umbrella to use for the second time and it would not open. I noticed the tip was loose and was no longer connected to the handle at the top. I was 1 week past the return date so nothing I could do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great.....I get A LOT of compliments on it!! Well made....shipped quickly and works just fine!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design. I like being able to hold it over myself and still see through it. The only con I’ve noticed is a very rubbery smell when it first arrived, but it has faded some with use.
customer_reviews.author: jodi coyote

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my child who had outgrown kid sized umbrellas but still wanted something fun. It's very "deep" so when you put it over your head it covers quite a bit. Took a few days of being open in the garage to get the awful plastic smell off but has been sturdy and works!
customer_reviews.author: edaley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a young lady.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our ten year old daughter and she loves it. The shape makes it perfect for one person and the handle is well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Pace

customer_reviews.title: It is cute and funny. People smile at me wherever I go
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not it is raining in Sunny California and my cute umbrella comes very handy. It is cute and funny. People smile at me wherever I go....
customer_reviews.author: M Berube

customer_reviews.title: Bvery pleased with this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t mind the rain because I wax well protected and I like the fish. After one year, I forgot it in one restaurant in another state. I was SO disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicole PAVILES

customer_reviews.title: How to do a much better inspection
customer_reviews.text: I did like all the color and the size it was a Christmas present to myself but it wasn't raining hard enough to use until several weeks after I could return it you see I found a 4 inch slit right down one of the ribs that I didn't find when I first opened it because I didn't open it fully.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but lazily painted
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute umbrella and hopefully it'll last me a while. I only wish they had put more care into the paint job. They spray painted the stem to look like it was metal but took no care covering the handle so thats a bummer. Like the umbrella a lot though and definitely not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lita Lita Lita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Goldfish Dome
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, although I haven't used it yet. It's a backup for a dome I'm already using. I know eventually they go so I have this one to use next. Domes work great because they really cover you in the rain but I do agree with other customers that they can be clumsy (especially getting in & out of your car) because they don't fold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: crap quality
customer_reviews.text: I only used this once in a non windy rainstorm. Went to use it a second time and the whole bottom liner was ripping off. So I spent my precious little time off hand sewing an umbrella. A first for me, so ridiculous. Almost a whole quarter on the bottom suddenly became ripped off/detached. I know my sewing job won't last because it's sewing thread through vinyl! Cheap China crap, don't bother
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bulicek

customer_reviews.title: It broke pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: We only had the umbrella for a few months before a gust of wind broke the spokes. Bummer, because I really liked the design.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen

customer_reviews.title: I got what I paid for and then some.
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, I’m happy with the very clear plastic umbrella dome itself. Nice printed design on the outside exactly like the picture! I bought this as a gift for a friend, we live somewhere very rainy and it’s held up nicely the past few weeks. The spring on the inside is a bit strong but nothing to complain about!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Verner

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Add some sun to a rainy day-functional, cute, like the bubble area to keep rain off of you better-arrives well packaged & on time-
customer_reviews.author: Pleased with Product

customer_reviews.title: Child size, not adult size
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fairly narrow adult woman, but I felt like I barley fit under this umbrella! Not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Berglund

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: It comes chalky just so you know before hand but it washes right off. This umbrella is so adorable and different. I get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Really cute! Sized for a smaller adult, or child
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute umbrella, but it is smaller in person than you would expect from seeing it in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful And colorful umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella for my daughter-in-law who requested it for Christmas, and she absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: mkelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it, I could see her and she could see me and don't have to swing the umbrella around to talk to me.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Angomas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the choices the dealer had. Fell in love with this one specifically. Working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Ries

customer_reviews.title: Whimsical with full coverage and decent visibility.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and appears sturdy. Will provide good coverage for one person. Does not become compact; so, a little bulky to carry or store.
customer_reviews.author: Kewpie

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: just as pictured very nice looking very sturdy I'm using it for photography prop
customer_reviews.author: Corrinda12

customer_reviews.title: My campus freshman loves her bumbershoot!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it so that makes it 5 stars in my mind!
customer_reviews.author: Southern belle

product_meta.title: Goldfish Habitat Bubble Umbrella
product_meta.description: Rainy days do not have to be boring anymore! Make your own statement with a genuine Galleria Umbrella. They are truly works of art! See our full collection of original artwork and famous artists.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
